Who: LORD PESEUS, Elita
Location: The Ark - Command Center

>
> Oops, that =
reminds me, Lord Elder's expectn' a report from me. I almost forgot! Lord E=
lder, Rat Trap here, and I got great news. Wheels did it sir. He was able t=
a jump start Rodimus and Rodimus is back on our side... Ughhh, ummm, un - f=
ortunately.. But, at least he's on our side again.. Anyway, they're still t=
ryn' ta get Nightlight'n Windlord outa there, and as far as I know, Rodimus=
 sprung everyone. Well, that wouldn'tve been possible if Wheels hadn't gott=
en through ta him. Anyway, that's the report, over."

Lord Elder sat back i=
n his chair, a broad smile coming over his face as he listened. He looked o=
ver at Elita, "You see, it is alright. Rodimus has been rescued." he said a=
s he leaned forward in his chair. 

He keyed his mic so that the others wou=
ld pick up his transmission, "I am relaying this information to the others =
as well, I am sure that Lord Perseus and the other maximals will be happy t=
o hear that we have Rodimus back." Elder said. 

Elder was troubled though =
as he transmitted the data to Legacy at the Maximal base. 

*     *     *  =
   *     *

Meawhile . . . 

Who: LEGACY
Location: Old Maximal Base - Tempo=
rary Command Center

Legacy received the information from Lord Elder, his s=
ingle optic pulsing as he read it. He looked up from the screen as he opene=
d a communication channel, and boosted the gain on it with his own not inco=
nsiderable skills.

"Autobots and Maximals!" Legacy's powerful voice and tr=
ansmission arced over the network, attempting to reach anyone that was in t=
he vicinity of the Maximal base or in the area surrounding it. (OOC: It sho=
uld reach anyone unless they don't want it to reach them)

"Rodimus has bee=
n freed from Hydras' control and now he, Tuscon, as well as those that acco=
mpanied him are under fire within Hydras' base. I predict with a 98.2775% c=
ertainty that they will need our assistance in order to be extricated from =
this."

As he talked Legacy had been on the move. he had already exited the=
 temporary command center and was walking to the exit of the base. "I reque=
st any back up that can be made available for this endeavor."

When he reac=
hed the outside Legacy shifted form, becoming a military satellite, complet=
e with guns, scanners and communication gear. "I am en route, and will send=
 data and co ordinates as requested."

Legacy took to the air!

(TAG)

Pres=
ton
